name: Dark Roads
description:
This is my first horror game. I hope you enjoy this game and the next ones to come.

It is about a person who is trapped in a maze. So the person who is trapped has to get out of that maze.

You will pass through certain traps that you will have to watch out for and enemies that will try to stop you. Throughout the maze you will find notes as to why you are in there.

It's just you alone, with your flashlight and a minimap that can help you get out of there and the great dark vastness that surrounds you.

Genre: First Person, Horror, Puzzle, Single Player

Duration: 15 - 20 minutes approx

Art Style: 3D, Realistic

Engine: Unity 2020.3
